CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("http://www.google.com/maps/search/?api=1&query=" + IF( ETST_Location__Latitude__s< 1,"0" + TEXT ( ETST_Location__Latitude__s), TEXT( ETST_Location__Latitude__s))+ "," + IF(ETST_Location__Longitude__s< 1, "0" + TEXT(ETST_Location__Longitude__s), TEXT (ETST_Location__Longitude__s)),"View PickUp Location in Maps")
CustomField.label: PickUp Location Link
